question: Which country has given Asylum to the Ex-President of Bolivia Evo Morales?
explanation: Ex-President of Bolivia Evo Morales has taken up the the political asylum in Mexico, vowing to continue the struggle. He had resigned amid mounting protests over his fraud-stained re-election to a fourth term on October 20th.He thanked President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador of Mexico for saving his life.He was forced to step down after losing the backing of the military and police amid weeks of increasingly violent protests over his constitutionally questionable re-election.
